        i18n
      • i18n(x: string): TranslatedString
Source   Edit  

Karax -- Single page applications for Nim.i18n support for Karax applications. We distinguish between:

  • translate: Lookup text translations
  • localize: Localize Date and Time objects to local formats

Localization has not yet been implemented.

Imports

languages, jdict, jstrutils

Types

TranslatedString = distinct cstring
Source   Edit   
Translation = JDict[cstring, cstring]
